TopicTitle: Minmus to Kerbin... on a ladder?

Articles.Content: I've got three brave Kerbonauts stranded in a capsule on Minmus. I can get two back in a rescue rocket, but not the third. The only idea I had for him was if I extend a ladder and have him cling on for dear life. Obviously this wouldn't work in real life, but this is the Kerbiverse, surely this has a chance of success?

surely this has a chance of success?
Not a good one, I'm afraid. Currenly, the little guys tend to slide up and fall off the tops of ladders, and you can't save the game while a Kerbal is on a ladder. I'm sure it can be done, but it would actually be easier to send another rescue rocket.

I've seen a video where someone added something like struts at the end of a ladder to keep a kerbalnaut from sliding off.

Of course, it's a bit late for that advice for this rescue mission.
